replies.author: Hallon
replies.txt_content:
正版在这里改皮肤登入后会看到MANAGE YOUR PROFILE
CHANGING THE WAY YOU LOOK IN-GAME
You can change the look of your in-game Minecraft character by choosing a different skin. In the PC/Mac version you can also choose between two player models.

It’s possible to change your look in all Minecraft editions, but the options below will only affect your look in Minecraft for PC/Mac.

Upload and change your skin
You can either create your own skin or find ready made ones on the internet. Check out this help article for more information about skins and downloadable skin templates.
Choose a player model
There are two player models available. Choose the classic "Steve" player model, or the slim "Alex" model with slimmer arms.
Drop your skin file here, or select a file to upload在
You can either create your own skin or find ready made ones on the internet. Check outthis help articlefor more information about skins and downloadable skin templates.
Choose a player mode那选择角色是Steve还是Alex
There are two player models available. Choose the classic "Steve" player model, or the slim "Alex" model with slimmer arms.
[tr=transparent]Drop your skin file here, or[tr=transparent]select a file[tr=transparent]to upload.


划线句子意思是
将你的皮肤文件拖到这里，或选择一个要上传。
上传完后几秒钟客户端的皮肤也会更改
注意：上传完后再进入盗版服务器可能只显示默认皮肤或以前的皮肤，属正常现象，在人少时进入服务器缓存即可


[tr=transparent][tr=transparent]

replies.author: MC天佑
replies.txt_content:
MC天佑 发表于 2016-7-11 00:49
百度网站，里面就是全最大的皮肤站，你如果联机能看见别人的皮肤的话，就说明你mods里有皮肤mod，那你就可 ...
那个网站是Skin是me，百度搜索，o(︶︿︶)o 唉，mcbbs和谐了那个网站的名字，你把英文中间的‘是’字去掉

replies.author: MC天佑
replies.txt_content: 百度网站，里面就是全最大的皮肤站，你如果联机能看见别人的皮肤的话，就说明你mods里有皮肤mod，那你就可以直接在网站选皮肤，在游戏的时候会自动显示的，如果你是单人，没安装皮肤mod，就安装下：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1ntkQGC5# ... 255BUniSkinMod%255D这很简单的，你试试，那个mod直接放进mods文件夹，你选对版本来下载。
